I am a seasoned professional with 10+ years of cybersecurity and IT consulting experience in diverse sectors. Recognized for demonstrating a natural aptitude for security architecture design, as well as for threat detection and risk mitigation. As such, I have consistently exceeded performance goals, and I am adept at achieving maximum operational impacts with minimal resource expenditure.

Interests

Apart from working as a cybersecurity professional, I like working out and I am recently learning how to dance. I enjoy dancing salsa and bachata since it allows me to socialize and meet new people.

In my free time when I am not working out or going to dance classes, I like to play video games, watch soccer games, and learn new things to keep up with the constantly evolving world of IT Security.
